Dated: 16/04/2015,

AVSEC CIRCULAR 04/2015

Subject: Vehicle facility at airports in respect of Shri S. Jaipal Reddy, Form
Hon‘ble Union Minister.

Shri S. Jaipal Reddy, Former Hon’ble Union Minister, shall be provided the
facility of AAI's ferry vehicle to and from aircraft at all civil airports in the country is
hereby extended for the period of three years ie. upto 15/04/2018 on medical
grounds.

This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).

v

(RN Dhoke, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)

Distribution as per list attached / overleaf.
